City Council
============

920 Mayor Kenneth A Gibson Boulevard Newark NJ 07102

[Directions](https://www.google.com/maps/place/920+Mayor+Kenneth+A+Gibson+Boulevard+Newark+NJ+07102)  
  
 Physical Address:View Map

920 Mayor Kenneth A Gibson Boulevard  
Newark, NJ 07102

Link: [City Council Page](https://www.newarknj.gov/160/Council-Members)
